title: WTB T206 Boston National (Trade Bait Added)
author: Abravefan11

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Boston National (Trade Bait Added)
posts.post_content:
Thank you to the board members that have helped me so far.  Below is a complete list of the T206 Boston National cards I need for my team Super Set.

I have the following T206's available for [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/Abravefan11/PreWarForSaleForTrade#"]TRADE[/URL]

I currently stand at 76 of 174 possible front/back combinations though several are considered "No Prints."

I am also interested in any T206 Boston National oddities, Missing ink, ghost images, etc.

If you have any of the following to offer please PM or email me at [url]abravefan@msn.com[/url]
